title: Communications with the central nonprofit agencies and the Committee.

children.text: (a) The addresses of the central nonprofit agencies are:

(1) National Industries for the Blind

1310 Braddock Place

Alexandria, VA 22314-1691

(703) 310-0500; and

(2) NISH

8401 Old Courthouse Road

Vienna, VA 22182

(571) 226-4660.
(b) Any matter requiring referral to the Committee shall be addressed to:

Executive Director of the Committee,

1401 S. Clark Street, Suite 10800,

Arlington, VA 22202-3259.
